myChat

Class ClientCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • myChat.ClientCode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientAble

    public class ClientCode
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientAble
    this class is the backend of the client GUI, all communication between the server and the client is managed here
    Author:
    Evgeny

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientCode(java.lang.String ip, int port, javax.swing.JTextArea textToGui)
      client code side regular constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allOnline(java.lang.String userName)
      if we got an "event" of reciving all nuserNames of all users who are online from GUI, we'll send the server a message which says " wants to see all online chat members"
      void close() 
      void connectMe(java.lang.String userName)
      if we got an "event" of connection from GUI, we'll send the server a message which says " wants to connect"
      void disConnectMe(java.lang.String userName)
      if we got an "event" of disconnection from GUI, we'll send the server a message which says " wants to disconnect"
      void sendPrivateMessage(java.lang.String sendUserName, java.lang.String recive, java.lang.String text)
      if we got an "event" of sending a private message from GUI, we'll send the server a message which says " wants to send a private message to "
      void sendPublicMessage(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String text)
      if we got an "event" of sending public message to all users who are online from GUI, we'll send the server a message which says " wants to send a message to all online users"

      • allOnline

        public void allOnline(java.lang.String userName)
        if we got an "event" of reciving all nuserNames of all users who are online from GUI, we'll send the server a message which says " wants to see all online chat members"

        Parameters:
        userName - user name of the client who sent the request
